dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so wait. Twenty-six point seven BILLION tenge? For a lake? Are you serious, B?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so wait. Twenty-six point seven B I L L I O N tenge? For a lake? Are you serious, B?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan has reclaimed a unique lake in the north of the country with a cadastral value of 26.7 billion tenge, the Prosecutor™s Office of the North Kazakhstan region reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, a bitter-saline one. It's back now though. That's, you know, the main thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, a bitter-saline one. It's back now though. That's, you know, the main thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bitter-saline lake has been returned to state ownership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Back now! After two years? The contract, um, for salt extraction, it ended in 2022! Two years, B!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back now! After two years? The contract, um, for salt extraction, it ended in twenty twenty two! Two years, B!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, despite the termination of the subsoil use contract in 2022, the authorized body failed to take unilateral pretrial action to terminate the lease for more than two years, violating the Land Code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, but these things, they take time. Bureaucracy. Lease agreements, they're not just, poof, gone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, but these things, they take time. Bureaucracy. Lease agreements, they're not just, poof, gone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not 'poof gone'? They violated the Land Code! Improper use of land from the water fund! And the business entity wasn't even removed from the active registry!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not 'poof gone'? They violated the Land Code! Improper use of land from the water fund! And the business entity wasn't even removed from the active registry!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This resulted in the improper use of land from the water fund," the Prosecutor™s Office stated. Additionally, the business entity was not removed from the official registry of active subsoil users, contradicting the requirements of the Code on Subsoil and Subsoil Use.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but it was fixed. The prosecutor, uh, stepped in. They resolved it. Unilaterally terminated the lease. Officials were disciplined.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but it was fixed. The prosecutor, uh, stepped in. They resolved it. Unilaterally terminated the lease. Officials were disciplined.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thanks to the actions of a specialized environmental prosecutor, the land lease agreement was unilaterally terminated through pretrial procedures. ... Responsible officials have been subjected to disciplinary action,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Disciplined! Who let this happen in the first place? That's the real issue. How does a 26 billion tenge asset just float around for two years?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Disciplined! Who let this happen in the first place? That's the real issue. How does a twenty six billion tenge asset just float around for two years?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It didn't 'float around', A. It was a lease oversight. A substantial one, sure, it's twenty-one thousand five hundred hectares.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It didn't 'float around', A. It was a lease oversight. A substantial one, sure, it's twenty-one thousand five hundred hectares.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the supervisory authority, in 2020, under a contract for salt extraction, local executive bodies granted subsoil use rights to Lake Teke, covering an area of 21,500 hectares.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oversight? That sounds like, um, more than an oversight to me. A specialized environmental prosecutor had to come in!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oversight? That sounds like, um, more than an oversight to me. A specialized environmental prosecutor had to come in!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thanks to the actions of a specialized environmental prosecutor, the land lease agreement was unilaterally terminated through pretrial procedures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they did! They did their job. The system, like, it eventually worked. It's returned to state ownership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they did! They did their job. The system, like, it eventually worked. It's returned to state ownership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bitter-saline lake has been returned to state ownership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eventually. After how much potential, I don't know, shady stuff? This isn't just a minor slip-up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eventually. After how much potential, I don't know, shady stuff? This isn't just a minor slip-up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the land is back. The value is reclaimed. That's, uh, that's a win, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the land is back. The value is reclaimed. That's, uh, that's a win, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan has reclaimed a unique lake in the north of the country with a cadastral value of 26.7 billion tenge...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Is it a win, B, when it takes two years and a specific intervention to get back what was already ours?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is it a win, B, when it takes two years and a specific intervention to get back what was already ours?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a win because it was fixed. End of story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a win because it was fixed. End of story.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's the start of the story, like, what else is out there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's the start of the story, like, what else is out there?
